channel.title: FOLKETS on Kiils
channel.description: Recent content in FOLKETS on Kiils

item.title: Quick ratio
item.description: The SaaS Quick Ratio is calculated by dividing MRR added by MRR lost. $ A = \frac{New MRR + Expansion MRR}{Churned MRR + Contraction MRR} $ https://www.slideshare.net/03133938319/saastr Guideline (per Social Capital’s Mamoon Hamid) SaaS Quick Ratio < 1: You’re dead. You could sustain a Quick Ratio of less than 1 for a month or two if you already have a good customer base, but anything longer and your churn is going to kill your company.
